DescriptionData.Title: Alan Sloane White Costume Gloves w/o Snap
DescriptionData.Description:
These Small white costume gloves set the standard for well-fitting white cotton clown gloves. Good for parades and for your clown costume. This glove comes without a snap.
To get the proper glove fit, measure the hand from the base of palm to fingertips. Available in Small, Medium, Large and Extra Large.
Length from base of palm to fingertips - Small: 6"; Medium: 7"; Large: 8"; Extra Large: 9"
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Cotton parade gloves for everyday clowning and performing
These gloves do not have a snap at the wrist
Length from base of palm to fingertips - Small: 6"; Medium: 7"; Large: 8"; Extra Large: 9"
Sold in pairs only
